[C] All your other '"Memories That Should Not Exist" Eugeo' gain +1000 Power.
[A] BOND/'"Memories That Should Not Exist" Eugeo' [(1)]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] When a Climax card is placed to your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] This cannot Side Attack.
[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Fluctlight:: Characters.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, this gains +2000 Power and the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this is Reversed, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[C] During your Opponent's turn, your other Character in the Front Row Center Slot gains +1500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Fluctlight:: Characters, and that Character gains +1 Level and +1000 Power for the turn.
[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[C] For each of your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Olden Days Adventure" is in the Climax Zone and you have another ::TRAIT:: Character, look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character from among them, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
--None--

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] For each of your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in your Waiting Room.
Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, return them to the top of the Library in their original order, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [(1)] When this is put from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose 1 card from among them, put it to Clock, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. If 1 card was put to Clock in this manner, choose 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this is Reversed, if "Declaration of Independence" is in your Climax Zone, look at the top card of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character from it, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, put any remaining card on top of your Library, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains the following ability. "[A] When this is Front Attacked, you may return it to hand."

[C] During your turn, for each of your other Characters with ::Avatar:: and/or ::Net::, this gains +500 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is Cancelled on the turn it is played from hand or from the Auto ability of '"Ocean Turtle" Asuna', put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = the Level of that card + 1. (Damage Cancel can occur. Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect.)
(Note: Because this card's Japanese name is different from the text used to target 'Character with "Asuna" in name', it does not have "Asuna" for the purpose of those specific effects. Cards that target this card by specific complete name still target this card.)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in your Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard a ::Fluctlight:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is Cancelled, if "Sword of Osmanthus" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, put the top 5 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room, choose up to X cards from your Opponent's Waiting Room, return them to their Library, your Opponent shuffles their Library, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = the total number of Soul icons among the cards moved to your Waiting Room via this effect. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a ::Fluctlight:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1) Discard a ::Fluctlight:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is played from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it to your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with ::Avatar:: and/or ::Net::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When this card attacks, look at the top card of your Library, and put it either on top of your Library or in your Waiting Room.
(Note: Because this card's Japanese name is different from the text used to target 'Character with "Asuna" in name', it does not have "Asuna" for the purpose of those specific effects. Cards that target this card by specific complete name still target this card.)

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have an ::Fluctlight:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your ::Fluctlight:: Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power and the following ability. "[C] In Battles involving this Character, your Opponent may not play Event cards from hand."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Fluctlight:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may put this in your Stock.

[A] When another of your Characters with "Kirito" and/or "Eugeo" in name is placed from hand to the Stage, for the turn this gains +1000 Power and ::Bento::.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is Reversed, if the Battling Opponent of this is higher Level than your Opponent, you may put that Character in Memory.
--None--
[C] All your Characters gain the following ability. "[A] When this card is Reversed in Battle, put it on the bottom of your Library."

[C] On your turn, if you have another Character with "Kirito" in name, this card gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this Direct Attacks, this gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[C] On your turn, if you have another Character with "Kirito" in name, this card gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this card attacks, you may put the top card of your Library in your Waiting Room. For each Soul Trigger Icon that card has, this card gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this Direct Attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] [Discard a card from hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed from hand to Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a level 0 or lower Character in your Waiting Room and place it to any slot on the Stage.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Avatar:: and/or ::Net:: character, draw up to 1 card, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, and take the top card of your Library and put it to Stock.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Put this in the Waiting Room] When "Where You Are" is placed in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose a '"If That Is My Answer" Asuna' in your Waiting Room and place it to the Slot this card was in.
(Note: Because this card's Japanese name is different from the text used to target 'Character with "Asuna" in name', it does not have "Asuna" for the purpose of those specific effects. Cards that target this card by specific complete name still target this card.)

Search your Library for up to 1 Character with "Alice" in name and up to 1 Character with "Kirito" in name, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library. Put this in Memory.

COUNTER If you do not have a ::Fluctlight:: Character you cannot play this from hand. You may put the top card of your Clock in your Waiting Room.
Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn. Send this to Memory.

"[A] When this Attacks, reveal the top card of your Library. If the revealed card is Level 1 or higher, put it in Stock." (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise, put the reveal card back)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose and perform 1 of the following effects. "Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room. If you do, put the top card of your Clock in your Stock." "Draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room." "Until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains +4500 Power and the following ability. 'In battles involving this, no player may play BACKUP from hand.'"

[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from your hand.

[A] BOND/"Eugeo, Fate Begins to Move" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] The Character Opposite this cannot be moved to another Slot.

[C] If this has a Marker under it, this gains +4000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [Discard a ::Fluctlight:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, if there is no Opponent's Character Opposite this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and move it to the slot Opposite this."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a "Alice, Unexpected Arrival" in your Waiting Room and put it face-up under this as Marker.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use an [S] ability, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.

If so, choose 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character from your Waiting Room, place it to an empty Slot on the Stage, and for the turn, that Character gains the following ability. "[A] When this attacks, you may deal 2 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)"

[A] [Put a card from hand to Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for 1 card with "Administrator" in the name, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[S] RESONANCE [(1) Reveal an '"Axiom Church High Priest" Administrator' from your hand to your Opponent, Rest 2 ::Fluctlight:: Characters] Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Fluctlight:: Character from among them, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the rest of those cards in the Waiting Room.

If it is a ::Fluctlight:: Character, choose 1 Character in your Waiting Room whose Level is less than or equal to 1 + your Level and place it Rested to any Slot on the Stage.

If not, that player puts the top card of the Library in Clock."

X = 1 + the Cost of the Opponent's Character placed in the Waiting Room by this effect.
